name: The Fast and The Furious: Drift
summary: It's the sequel to The Fast and The Furious. It is sold by Raw Thrills as an upgrade kit that can be used in almost all driving game cabinets; as an upgrade kit for The Fast and The Furious and as a standalone cabinet.
